TopicTitle: How to uninstall the kerbal optimisation program mod

Articles.Content: It tells you that you have to run a cmd or powershell command but I tried everything and it always tells me that there is an error and I can't figure out how to uninstall it

I just did this and it worked fine.  First I deleted the mod from the spacewarp folder.  When you open the command prompt you need to "cd" to the KSP location.  I have a shortcut on the desktop so I just used cd to switch to desktop.  Then type KSP2 and you can use the tab key to autocomplete the command for you.  Then type the -screen-quality Fantastic part.

Edited March 3, 2023 by Jason_25
